description:
At the law office of Brent Adams & Associates in Raleigh, North Carolina, we are fully committed to helping you through what is likely a very difficult and uncertain time in your life. Serving clients throughout the state, our law firm has four total office locations throughout the state, and we have become one of the leading legal practices for those facing complex legal challenges involving any of the following:

  • Personal injury
  • Social Security Disability, veterans' disability and long-term disability insurance
  • Bankruptcy
  • Medical malpractice
  • Dangerous and defective medications
  • Insurance disputes
  • Nursing home neglect
  • Workers' compensation

Since we first opened our doors in 1973, our law firm has achieved unprecedented success advocating on behalf of the injured and disabled as well as those seeking relief from their overwhelming debt. Over the course of our history, we have recovered millions of dollars in settlements and awards for our plaintiff clients, and our attorneys have received numerous awards and honors for their professionalism and service.

Treating you with the compassion and respect you deserve, we promise to fight hard to help you secure the finances you need to cover your medical bills, lost wages and other expenses associated with your accident, and we have earned many positive reviews and referrals from satisfied clients.

To find out more about how Brent Adams & Associates can best serve you and your family in your time of need, you can contact our law office to schedule a free initial consultation concerning your matter.

We are a debt relief agency. We help people file for bankruptcy relief under the Bankruptcy Code.
